Text: And I thought I was a Sci-Fi nerd...LOL   I have literally thousands of Sci-Fi and Fantasy books....but this stuff....OMG its delicious^^

This is another of my favorites...not lost just getting dusty in my cabinet.  I really never thought they would still be enjoyed so much.  Your in luck as I still have a ton of others.  

Thanks for the comments!
I'm finding so many GREAT 'B' Scifi my brain may explode!  Thank you bit stream
